products.name: Shelf Improvement
products.description:
Shelf Improvement is a new book subscription service from the Guardian that aims to improve the literary lives of book lovers. 

The exact book remains a mystery until it lands on the doorstep, so it is the perfect way to encounter totally fresh voices and vistas.
